vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
φορτούνατος (Rec. Φουρ-, see Mayser, 116 f.), -ου, ὁ
(Lat.) Fortunatus: 1Co.16:17 (see Lft., Cl. Ro., 1Co., 59).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 1Co.16.17
§ Fortunatus, "fortunate"
Fortunatus, (Proper name), 1Cor. 16:17*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
福徒拿都 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "裝得滿滿的"
哥林多的一位基督徒 (林前 16:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
福徒拿都 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "装得满满的"
哥林多的一位基督徒 (林前 16:17)
